adm:managed-object.name: member-virtual-attribute
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis:
The
is used to generate a member or uniqueMember attribute whose values are the DNs of the members of a specified group. This is used to implement virtual static group functionality, in which it is possible to create an entry which looks like a static group but obtains all of its membership from a dynamic group (or some other type of group, including another static group).

adm:property.name: allow-retrieving-membership
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Indicates whether to handle requests that request all values for the virtual attribute. This can be a very expensive operation in some cases, and is not in-line with the primary function of virtual static groups, which is to make it possible to use static group idioms to determine whether a given user is a member.
